abstract: Latvian lawmakers elect Defense Min Raimonds Vejonis as next president, replacing Andris Berzins.
lead_paragraph: After five rounds of voting, lawmakers on Wednesday chose Defense Minister Raimonds Vejonis as Latvia’s next president

headline.print_headline: Europe; Latvia: Defense Chief Elected President

snippet: After five rounds of voting, lawmakers on Wednesday chose Defense Minister Raimonds Vejonis as Latvia’s next president
